data.title: NS3 Cover Band Collection (version 6.0) — Patch Foundry
data.meta_description: FEATURES    • 530 total files (5.82 GB)  • UPDATED 381 song-specific program files inspired by classic cover band songs (150+ detailed patches w/ multiple splits, 150+ piano based with organ/synth section) and growing with regular updates  • NEW 80+ song-specific synth presets for building your own
data.text:
The most comprehensive collection of song-specific patches for cover band keyboardists. Ever.

The Nord Stage 3 Cover Band Collection features 375 song-specific patches, making it easier on keyboard players to instantly have the exact sounds needed for the song at their fingertips. No programming needed. Around 200 of the programs are complex synth-heavy multi-layered song-specific patches, and the rest are a carefully crafted piano/synth/organ song-specific patches for more straightforward songs.

This collection covers everything from top modern hits to classic jazz standards, and is the most complete collection of song-specific patches ever commercially available for The Nord Stage 3.

New Song-Specific Synth Presets

There are 150 new song-specific synth presets available in the 6.0 update. Whether you want to dial up the synth for “Yeah” or “Billie Jean”, it’s just a quick spin of the dial.

Battle-tested for 9 years with one of the top 10 corporate bands in the USA.

I’m part of The Downtown Band, ranked in the top 10 for the best live party music in the USA 4 years in a row. We perform for dozens of luxury weddings, corporate events, and party gigs each year. The patches you’ll buy have been used at each one of these gigs, tweaked and live-tested night after night to produce a quality product any audience can enjoy.

Updates forever. Free.

The Downtown Band regularly adds new songs to the setlist to which I then create new patches. When you purchase this pack, you’ll get access to additional patch updates for free. For as long as I’m performing live with a Nord Stage 3, you’ll be getting backstage access to all the patches I make.

Free “Fly Date” version of all patches.

If you’re a road warrior and frequently use backline keyboards, or if you just prefer to keep as much of your factory content on your keyboard as possible, this update is huge. The Cover Band Collection has been completely reworked to use 95% factory content, meaning that you can get all of your sounds and patches downloaded to a factory-reset Nord Stage 3 in under 8 minutes (down from the previous 45 minutes).

One-patch-per-song speed.

There’s nothing worse than trying to find the right sound when a band leader makes an audible onstage. That’s why I put a lot of effort into getting each song to be just one patch, meaning you’re not bogged down with a massive library of songs. Then you can use the Nord’s alphabetical search feature to find the song you need quickly.

Easy installation.

It’s really easy to download the Nord Stage 3 Worship Collection into your Nord. With two install methods, it’s possible to either:

• Quickly swap out archive files depending on the project you’re working on

• Merge the Cover Band Collection with your current patches

Here’s a video detailing exactly how to do it:

Patch List
